channel.title: How do i allow my server through the fire wall
channel.description: hi i got a fire wall but i dont want to disable it how do i allow my server to be connected to without disabling it and i need to know where and what to type in the stuff thanks

item.title: How do i allow my server through the fire wall
item.dc:creator: @Dell Dell
item.description:
@Dell wrote:

just go to ur firewall and open up internet connections, and allows ports through 43594 . its all pretty much self-explanatory

Read full topic

item.title: How do i allow my server through the fire wall
item.dc:creator: @Skillapwnz Skillapwnz
item.description:
@Skillapwnz wrote:

just turn your firewall off its not a bad thing to have it off if you have a antivirus, plus most people who host servers just keep their firewall off if u donâ€™t want to turn it off add it in the exceptions list and etc and click it and make it except but i suggest just instead of wasting time just turn it off.
